name: Alpha Project
description:
"Alpha Project" is a game in which you try to reach the goal by solving the puzzle in an isometric world of science fiction.

Our main character has the ability to clone himself wherever he wants, and he uses it in each section to solve puzzles.

It is necessary to hack computers to avoid obstacles and reach the door. But how will the main character access computers in areas that are out of reach? It is best to send your own clone to these areas.

HOW TO PLAY?

1- Movement Keys : W,A,S,D
2- To clone yourself: Q - Your clone appears at the mouse position.
3- Interact with Computers: E
4- Switch your character between your clone : TAB
Extras: 
Black Doors: Both character and clone can not pass throughout the wall.
Orange Walls: Clone can pass these walls but character can not.
Blue Walls: Character can pass these walls but clone can not.
